definition: to check/to examine/to inspect/to exercise restraint

sentences.english: Contact shipping companies, and complete declaration of export commodities and inspection work.
sentences.chinese: 联系船运公司，并完成出口商品的报关和报检工作。

sentences.english: The company was founded in 1998, is old inspection company.
sentences.chinese: 本公司成立于1998年，是老字号的报检公司。

sentences.english: Going through the formalities for exports in need of verification by law in Suzhou.
sentences.chinese: 代理企业出口法检产品的苏州报检手续。

sentences.english: And packaging for export goods inspection on behalf of the enterprise.
sentences.chinese: 并可为出口货物包装的企业代为报检。

sentences.english: Possessing the ability of searching science information.
sentences.chinese: 具有科学情报检索的能力。

sentences.english: When going through the formalities of applying for inspection, the agent shall submit his letter of authorization to the commodity inspection authorities.
sentences.chinese: 办理报检手续时应当向商检机构提交授权委托书。

definition: (international trade) documentation (e.g. a bill of lading)

pinyin: chu1 ru4 jing4 jian3 yan4 jian3 yi4 ju2

definition: general trade (i.e. importing and export without processing)
